aggressive.description: Prefers high‑damage attacks and relentless pressure.

defensive.description: Focuses on survival, mitigation, and counterattacks.

balanced.description: A flexible mix of offense and defense.

reckless.description: High‑risk, high‑reward attackers who rarely defend.

caster.description: Prefers spells and abilities over physical attacks.

support.description: Uses buffs, heals, and utility abilities frequently.

chaotic.description: Unpredictable behavior with wildly shifting priorities.
